name: Harvelution
description:
Simple prototype of a laid back farming game made for Gogodotjam may 2022!

Endless game where your crops will have slight variations of the value from the seed that got planted. You can then choose which crops should be sold for quick profit and which should be reseeded for the chance of even higher value in the future!

NOTE: Saving not working in web.

Music created by: https://open.spotify.com/artist/6h51BsOfwTcYofH39Au1Bw

Art bought from: https://cupnooble.itch.i
